title: 64 - Safe To Lament
description:
In this episode we expand the conversation on spiritual maturity by observing Walter Brueggemann's "Spirituality of the Psalms."  We ask; How do we as a church celebrate so much of God's goodness when the current generation is being so disoriented by the chaos around them?  There is so much to learn from how David spoke to God.  Often, many of us would never be as honest as he was.  Especially after this week of political events, we (the Church)have so much to consider.

- Mike Erre

Resource: Spirituality of the Psalms (Facets) - Walter Brueggemann https://www.amazon.com/Spirituality-Psalms-Facets-Walter-Brueggemann/dp/0800634500
